document_data.name: Marquox
document_data.mainbody: '''Marquox''' was a [[mind flayer]] prisoner of the [[githyanki]] in [[Undermountain]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.History: Around the [[1492 DR|Year of Three Ships Sailing, 1492 DR]] Marquox's fellow mind flayers [[Tel'zact]] and [[Yeluit]] went inside the [[Crystal Labyrinth]] level and disappeared. Marquox followed them in but was captured by the githyanki and, very unusually for them, kept alive inside a cell.
document_data.Relationships: Marquox was a member of the illithid colony inside the [[Seadeeps]] Level with a good relationship with Tel'zact and Yeluit.
